doc:
Bobby Clark (comedian) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bobby_Clark_(comedian) 0 Robert Edwin Clark (June 16, 1888 – February 12, 1960), known as Bobby Clark, was a minstrel, vaudevillian, performer on stage, film, television and the circus. Known for his painted-on eyeglasses, he was part of a comedy team with Paul McCullough for 36 years. Robert_Edwin_Clark ( June_16_,_1888 – February_12_,_1960 ) , known as Bobby_Clark , was a_minstrel , vaudevillian , performer on stage_,_film_,_television and the_circus .
